connections.when: implementing VS Code extension APIs and patterns
connections.yields: Extension context access, command registration, activation lifecycle

connections.when: designing token management UI with quick picks and input boxes
connections.yields: User-friendly token entry flow, warning message patterns, status indicators

connections.when: testing SecretStorage across platforms and error scenarios
connections.yields: Platform-specific testing, manual verification, automated test patterns

connections.when: Gamma features require API key from SecretStorage
connections.yields: Secure token retrieval for Gamma integration
